entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening then changing to rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023
